p:
Approximately 3 × 10 5 splenocytes were plated in 96-well plates and stimulated with 1.2 × 10 4 FFU ZIKV FSS13025 or 10 mg/mL E peptide
19 for 3 days. Culture supernatants were harvested and frozen at −80 °C. Cytokines IL-2 and IFN-γ in the culture supernatants were measured using a Bio-Plex Pro Mouse Cytokine Assay (Bio-Rad) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
